channel.title: MCX:ROSN on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in MCX:ROSN on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Exxon Held Talks With Rosneft Over Russia Re-Entry, WSJ Says
item.description: Exxon Mobil Corp. held talks with Russia’s state-controlled oil company about returning to its Sakhalin-1 oil development, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.

item.title: Exxon Held Talks With Rosneft Over Russia Re-Entry, WSJ Says
item.description: Exxon Mobil Corp. held talks with Russia’s state-controlled oil company about returning to its Sakhalin-1 oil development, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.

item.title: Embattled Indian Refiner Nayara Names Socar Executive as New CEO
item.description: Nayara Energy Ltd, the Europe-sanctioned oil refiner that’s partially owned by Russian giant Rosneft PJSC, appointed a new Chief Executive Officer from a unit of Azerbaijan’s state-run oil company.

item.title: Embattled Indian Refiner Nayara Names Socar Executive as New CEO
item.description: Nayara Energy Ltd, the Europe-sanctioned oil refiner that’s partially owned by Russian giant Rosneft PJSC, appointed a new Chief Executive Officer from a unit of Azerbaijan’s state-run oil company.

item.title: Rosneft’s Refinery in Volga Region Halts Oil Intake After Attack
item.description: Russia’s Saratov refinery, owned by Rosneft PJSC, has stopped oil intake following a drone attack on Sunday, according to a person familiar with the matter.

item.title: Rosneft’s Refinery in Volga Region Halts Oil Intake After Attack
item.description: Russia’s Saratov refinery, owned by Rosneft PJSC, has stopped oil intake following a drone attack on Sunday, according to a person familiar with the matter.

item.title: Nayara Energy Names New Chief Executive After Former CEO Resigns
item.description: Nayara Energy Ltd., a company partially owned by Russian giant Rosneft PJSC and recently hit by EU sanctions, has appointed a new chief executive officer following the resignation of its previous CEO

item.title: Nayara Energy Names New Chief Executive After Former CEO Resigns
item.description: Nayara Energy Ltd., a company partially owned by Russian giant Rosneft PJSC and recently hit by EU sanctions, has appointed a new chief executive officer following the resignation of its previous CEO

item.title: EU Sanctions Against India’s Nayara ‘Unjustified,’ Rosneft Says
item.description: Newly imposed European sanctions against India’s Nayara Energy refinery are “unjustified and illegal,” according to Russian oil major Rosneft PJSC that co-owns the facility.

item.title: EU Sanctions Against India’s Nayara ‘Unjustified,’ Rosneft Says
item.description: Newly imposed European sanctions against India’s Nayara Energy refinery are “unjustified and illegal,” according to Russian oil major Rosneft PJSC that co-owns the facility.
